document.full_text: the $11.1 billion offer includes a $350 million breakup fee to be paid to nyse euronext if it the merger deal does not win antitrust approval.
document.title: nasdaq and ice unveil official bid for nyse euronext
lines_and_colors: the $11.1 billion offer includes a $350 million breakup fee to be paid to nyse euronext if it the merger deal does not win antitrust approval.
